Package org.CAP5400.Toolbox

Class Fourier

java.lang.Object
org.CAP5400.Toolbox.Fourier
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class Fourier extends Object implements AutoCloseable
This class is used to perform Fourier Transform operations on an image. The operations that can be performed are:
  • Low Pass Filter
  • High Pass Filter
  • Band Stop Filter
  • Unsharp Masking
The class is used to perform the operations on a given region of interest. The user specifies the region of interest. The user can also specify the color space and the channel on which the operations will be performed.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Reubin George

      Method that applies a filter to an image
      Parameters:
      distance1 - distance 1 of the filter
      distance2 - distance 2 of the filter (might be optional depending on the filter)
      filterType - type of filter. It must be one of the following: "Low Pass", "High Pass", "Band Stop"
